properties.entry: SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE FROM business a, decision_list b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND b.DECISION_CODE = 1 AND b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 AND b.D_LIST_REASON is null LIMIT ?,?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND b.DECISION_CODE = 1 AND b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 AND b.D_LIST_REASON is null

select a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_PROFIT , b.HR_ID , b.HR_NAME , b.HR_PHONE , b.HR_EMAIL from business a , HR b where a.B_CODE = b.B_CODE and a.B_CODE = ?
update DECISION_LIST d, BUSINESS b SET d.DECISION_CODE = 2 , d.D_LIST_DATE = now() , d.D_LIST_REASON = ? , d.ADMIN_ID = ? where d.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE and b.b_CODE = ?
